appendix.title: Obsolete Appendix (was: Example Instructions for Reporting Bugs)

simplesect.para: This appendix used to contain a lightly-edited copy of the Subversion project's online instructions to new users on how to report bugs. They're still good instructions, and are referenced from in . But as they are a living document, I felt it didn't make sense to include a frozen snaphot of them here, and so no longer maintain a copy in this appendix. You can view them at subversion.apache.org/reporting-issues.html.
